entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Bancroft
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:29 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 2:00 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Temperature: -7.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -9.5°C
Wind: NNE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 21. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
